member.name: T:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions
member.summary: Contains extension methods defined for the class.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToMd5Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the MD5 hash of string.
member.param: The string whose hash, the method computes.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToBoolean(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the string can be interpreted as the
member.returns: True if the string can be converted to the "true".

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.CapitalizeFirstLetter(System.String)
member.summary: Return a copy of the string with its first letter converted to uppercase.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to this instance, except its first letter, which is uppercase.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetStringBetween(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a substring which is between and . Search start from index.
member.param: The left delimiter of the result string.
The right delimiter of the result string.
The start position of the search.
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the substring, which is between and searching from or System.String.Empty if or don't occur within the instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertCyrillicToLatinLetters(System.String)
member.summary: Replace all occurrences of cyrillic letters in this instance with their latin counterparts.
member.returns: A string in which all instances of cyrillic letters are replaced with their latin equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ConvertLatinToCyrillicKeyboard(System.String)
member.summary: Replace all occurrences of latin letters in this instance with their cyrillic counterparts
member.returns: A string in which all instances of Latin letters are replaced with their cyrillic equivalents.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Return a string in which the cyrillic letters are replaced with their latin equivalents and all non-alphanumeric characters are removed.
member.returns: A copy of this instance where all cyrillic letters are replaced with their latin equivalents and all non-alphanumeric characters are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToValidLatinFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Return a string in which the cyrillic letters are replaced with their latin equivalents, spaces are replaced with "-", all non-alphanumeric characters are removed.
member.returns: A copy of this instance where all cyrillic letters are replaced with their latin equivalents, spaces are replaced with "-" and all non-alphanumeric characters are removed.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFirstCharacters(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Return a substring of the instance which starts from the beginning and whose length is the lesser of the string's length and .
member.param: The number of characters in the substring.
member.returns: A string containing the first characters of the instance.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.GetFileExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Return the file extension of the string. The period "." is omitted.
member.returns: The last item in the array, which is obtained by splitting the string by the period "." character.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToContentType(System.String)
member.summary: Return the corresponding content type for the specified file extension.
member.returns: The content type as a string.

member.name: M:Telerik.ILS.Common.StringExtensions.ToByteArray(System.String)
member.summary: Convert set of characters from the specified character array, into a sequence of bytes.
member.returns: A byte array containing the specified set of characters.
